website_summaries.verdict: If you mount these lamps in the right space on your headboard or wall, they are great for bedside reading.
pros: You can pull these lamps out or push them back to meet your needs
They come in a variety of shade and finish colors
Easy to pull in and out
An attractive way to save space on your nightstand
cons: The swing arms can be rather tight to move when you first get these lamps
The shades could be better quality

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are made well for the price. Are three way lamps w med brown paper shades. Easy to install either by plug into outlet or hard wire. Well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Penny-pincher

customer_reviews.title: Good lamps at the right price. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a new place and needed new lamps for the bedroom. I looked on all sorts of furnishings sites, and landed on these. They fit my price range and I saw that the reviews were good. I've installed this sort of wall lamp before (I used the plug-in option, not the hard wired option), so I knew it'd be easy. Lamps arrived, packaged well, with all of the needed hardware and everything in working order. There is one dent in one lamp's hinge, but you can't see it and it didn't impede the works of the arm, so I didn't care. Easy to install, and worked perfectly. I purchased 3-way LED bulbs, and good to go. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Utterly darling. Just what you want. Not underdone, not overdone. Mine costed $48.00 a piece. Now sold as a two pack. OK Buy two. You'll find a place for both I assure you. Make sure you move the arms back & forth a few times before you mount these to make sure they are easy to adjust. They're a little tight right out of the box probably designed that way to avoid loose joints and sagging which is common in these types of lamps. Total taste! 5 star hotel quality.
customer_reviews.author: OlderWiserReader

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I thought these might be/look cheap since they are so inexpensive, but was pleasantly wrong:) These arrived very quickly and look amazing. I've installed them above both sides of my bed and they immediately gave my master bedroom a quality look. Important! follow the directions: swing the arms back and forth several times to loosen them up because they are quite stiff out of the package, so glad I did. The adjustable arms swing smoothly and the lamps are very sturdy. Great for my nightly reads - which I've switched to instead of TV - sleep has improved greatly.
customer_reviews.author: bprice

customer_reviews.title: simple, nice looking, arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the lamp shades. We wanted black swing-arm, plug-in wall lamps for the guest bedroom that didn't take up floor space, and so guests could escape our presence and read quietly in bed. We wanted columnar white shades. These come with the typical flared shades, in a light brown color. So, disappointed we didn't have a choice of shades, we bought the white shades separately, and will give away the brown(ish) shades. They installed pretty easily - an electric drill helps.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I chose to do the flush mount on my wall as there were no junction boxes and the outer wall has cross braces and insulation so would have been harder to hard-wire. As it turned out I have them both mounted to wall studs. I also had to put dimples in the wall to accommodate the screw heads for mounting the light fixture to the base plate. Installation was not that bad and the finished result looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pappa Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  Can use 3-way lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a set of swing arm wall lamps that I've had in my bedroom for 30 years, but finally stopped working. These are nice looking, and I love being able to use a 3-way lightbulb to adjust the amount of light it gives off. Only thing "wrong" is that my original lamps turned on with a touch, and this one requires I turn a switch. Not a big deal, but took a little time to adjust to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small bedroom
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect lamps for a small bedroom. No need to have a bedside table, and the lamps will never be tipped over by an overenthusiastic kitty. The lampshades are a bit larger than I expected, but look great with our natural wood headboard. The metal covers for the cords aren't very long, but still look nice and keep the cords in place. Easy for an experienced handy person to install. Very happy with these, and recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Doc W8

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: No disappointment with this purchase! The price was right, and the well made. I read many reviews before I made this purchase, and any issues that others had in the past seemed to be corrected. The swing arm works well, and I appreciate the light these lamps produce! I bought the LED bulbs, which helps as well. The shades aren't as transparent as I thought, but as I said, the lighting is better than you might want for just reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It uses a three way bulb
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lamps awhile ago. After Much insisting my husband finally decided to install them. I didnt hear him complaining about installation and installed both units in less than 40 minutes. I really like that the lamps adjust in various ways for your reading needs and that it uses a three way bulb. They look beautiful on our masterbedroom wall, it gives it a new modern look! Item was well packaged, nothing was missing. I would definitely recommend you purchasing these lamps you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Pflores

customer_reviews.title: Great but consider the shades beforehand
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these a 5 because I knew I would be getting other lampshades when I bought the lamps. The lampshades look like cardboard and don’t diffuse light well. They might allow enough light for a bedside wall lamp, but they are kind of big. The lamps themselves are sturdy and look great. Be sure to follow the directions to oil the hinges before you hang them on the wall. They were really stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the $$$$$$
customer_reviews.text: I just bought Lamps Number 4 & 5. The first two I think I bought about 20 years ago (hard to remember). I'm still using them. We did install in line switches a couple of years ago. Lamp number 3 was about 8 years ago. On off switch still works fine. I was a little concerned that you tightened the frame up and sent me an e-mail about it but we followed the instructions and it seems O. K. but why mess with something that works well???? The picture is the first two 20-year-old lamps.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation, well engineered
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace very expensive sconces purchased from a west coast high end home decor store and I was so pleased!! For the price they are simply awesome. I did intend to use other shades so the quality of the shade was not an issue. I’m going to donate the shades that were included.
customer_reviews.author: chelle_luv_kitties

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Our living room is so dark and I just didn't seem to be able to find a lamp that brightened it up. These are perfect! I can see to read, draw, work on my computer!! Love them! Easy to install too. My husband didn't even swear! LOL Great product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Doeden

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard lamp shades for this price, seriously!
customer_reviews.text: They say Opaque beige paper shade, this is not paper, it is cardboard. The interior side is finished way nicer than the exterior. For this price it should have fabric over the exterior side of the cardboard like the interior. The cardboard makes them look very cheap & unfinished and at this price they will be sent back. I like the way they say fancy cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: JWH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the lamp shade is not good. I have to spend more money purchasing two more shades. The shade appears to be made of recycled brown cardboard. Although its very thick and sturdy feeling. Also, the shade is so cardboard-like that no light emits from it. Just the top and bottom emits light. Other than than, the lamp seems to be good quality. I really do like having them bedside. Its nice having extra room on my tables.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: I prefer having the option of using the cord it ...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer having the option of using the cord it comes with to plug into existing wall socket or hardwiring. Hanging the lamp requires minimal amount of damage to wall. A few hand tools are all that is needed - although an electric drill came in handy making pilot holes in the lath & plaster walls of our home.. The directions are included and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. CHO

customer_reviews.title: I FOUND the LAMPS
customer_reviews.text: I am so embarrassed that I first gave a bad review because I thought I only received the lamp shades. I was getting ready to return this item when I spotted a dummy bottom in the box! I was so happy to find the lamps! They are beautiful! I am sorry that I did not discover this sooner. Thank you for my beautiful lamps!
customer_reviews.author: Debbe Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our master bedroom. Looked at many different lights and found these to be a great price and what I was looking for. Arrived on time, installation was easy. Very nice addition to our room, freeing up night stands. Quality very good, best product and best price.
customer_reviews.author: Maspaws

customer_reviews.title: Faulty cord bracket
customer_reviews.text: Track system not long enough or adjustable. It also does not stay on the wall cause there's no way to secure it. It relies on pressure from flimsy medical clips. Didn't come with screws. Lamp shade is cardboard!!!! Literally just plain cardboard, no cover or anything
customer_reviews.author: virgil perry

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are just what I was looking for. They are replacing other wall lamps of the same design. Product is well made for the price. The shades are cheap - made from cardboard. I'm either going to do something artsy with them (add fabric) or get some new shades. Since the mounting hardware was the same as my previous lamps, it was very easy to install. Even if the mounting hardware was needed, installation is easy. They can also be hardwired.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: These lights are awesome! They are exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome! They are exactly as described. They are super easy to install and look great on our wall. I was so impressed with the company. After ordering I received an email with updated instructions on how to install. They also emailed to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase. Very pleased! If you are looking for some great wall lamps this is the place to order.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these sconces for my teenage sons room, honestly i wanted something fast so didn't go the normal route of buying from Restoration Hardware or Pottery Barn and wow am i glad - quality just as good (i may replace the paper shades but they don't bother me at all now that they are up) and i saved at least $200. I will definitely purchase their products again. Also love that I can use a higher wattage, 3-way light as it is typically not the case with wall sconces.
customer_reviews.author: Terri boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we bought this style of light. Overall the assemble easily and work very well for what we needed in our living room. Last time we had purchased the single, the two pack was a great value and gave us both lights we needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light and provides ample light for reading in bed.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great looking lamps and work well. I like the 3 way switch and the brown finish. I’m going to order another set! Do you ever have a sale on them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We were able to put the lamps on our bedroom wall without much trouble. They are basic and attractive, a nice buy. I am particularly pleased that it is a 3-Way lamp.
customer_reviews.author: SueD

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I'd bought two others from this manufacturer and they were much heavier. Turns out they're resin and these are metal. Duh. Both such good buys. I'm having trouble getting lamps this well made.
customer_reviews.author: Crankygrandma

customer_reviews.title: The perfect touch.
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect touch for lighting next to our bed on both sides and leaving the side table clear. These even sent an email with instructions on how to loosen up the arms before they are installed. Easy to install and well protected in the package. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not the finest quality but they were easy enough to install, look very nice and are perfect for reading in bed while leaving our night tables free for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps with the exception of the shades. They kind of look like cardboard but I can take care of that with a little ingenuity. The lamps themselves are great quality. Packaged properly. (Yes, I've had a lot of problems with internet orders that were not packed for the rough and tumble delivery process) Easy to put up and look and work great! They even arrived a day early!
customer_reviews.author: Mugsy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipped very fast
customer_reviews.text: Great product, shipped very fast. Very easy install. We really like the matching conduit that comes with the lamps it looks great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: loved it and already encourage others to buy. Little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: jackiep

customer_reviews.title: Shades are cardboard!!
customer_reviews.text: The shades are made of cardboard. Initially I thought the shades had a protective wrap of cardboard, but no. It is the shade itself.
customer_reviews.author: GeoDad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps finally I have lamps near my bed I can reach laying in bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer dog lady

customer_reviews.title: Easy install lamps
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lights to reduce the need for side tables. Easy to install on the wall next to my recliners
customer_reviews.author: ERNEST

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: We love these lamps! They were easy to install and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Philco

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but I wanted more light so i swapped out the shades for mor translucent ones
customer_reviews.author: Wfeld

customer_reviews.title: Good bedside reading and general lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Just needed the lower cord cover base. Only had base for upper cord covers making the lose cord covers unusable. However the lower coed area is hidden but tables. Would be nice to have lower base. Overall the lamps are excellent and are just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard looking Shade
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works well with LEDs. I only wish the paper shade didn't look like they forgot to put the fabric on... It looks like cardboard in case you were wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Books

customer_reviews.title: They work great and look great.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that the retaining screws which hold the light to the mounting bracket are made of plastic instead of metal, but, they seem to hold just fine. We used the lights to add lighting to our sofa ends so my wife can see do do work for her teaching career. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ficker

customer_reviews.title: Okay lights
customer_reviews.text: Average quality. Shades are very cheaply made. I'll probably replace them. Not too bad for the price but don't expect much when you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Huntsabunch

customer_reviews.title: Plan to buy shades to replace unfinished cardboard. BUT nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The metal and electrical is absolutely great. The shade has very nice heavy metal components holding a piece of UNFINISHED CARDBOARD on the visible side and white nice finish inside. We have to replace the shades. We ordered the beige which is not cardboard brown and cardboard rough.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Creasy

customer_reviews.title: stylish and full swivel mount
customer_reviews.text: easy to mount, full swivel arm, takes 3 way bulbs...we have 4 in our living room
customer_reviews.author: NK X-COUNTRY SKIER/HIKER

customer_reviews.title: great sturdy attractive light - good price
customer_reviews.text: I've been replacing old wall lamps in our motel and cabins with these -- they are simple, attractive, and look great in a comfy rustic environment. Sometime we hard wire them in and sometimes just plug into a wall outlet-- both are easy. I keep buying more because I like the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pine Crest Motel and Cabins

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the side lamps
customer_reviews.text: I was originally frustrated because my husband told me he was missing a page of instructions. He did not turn page two over to reveal page THREE. I am very pleased with the side lamps. Very easy to hang. I put more screws in the back plate to make it more secure and rotated the swing arm to loosen it.
customer_reviews.author: donna fanale

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. A lot easier to install than the one I had been using for 12 years. Plus my wife likes them so my status has gone up
customer_reviews.author: John Carter Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: They are very pleased with these lamps. Previously had ordered from another company and then the lambs were very inferior and I ended up having to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective ordered a replacement and it too was defective!
customer_reviews.text: One lamp did not work at all. Returned it. Now 2 hours later the one installed will not work. The lamps caused the circuit breaker to flap. Need to return back the one I thought worked...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly happy with my lights
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Shades are made of cardboard stock with a plastic cover. Sounds funny, but they are absolutely great. No light gets through the sides. Work great on each side of our bed. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: easy to put on wall. great looking lamps. encourage you to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Amelia Alice

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, packaged well. Easily installed, although I used toggle fasteners since I knew there was no stud in the wall where I planned to hang it. Your email hint was spot on. And no matter what others say, I like the shades, they fit in well with my furnishings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall lamps
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Exactly what I ordered. The lamp shade is perfect. The product packing was exceptional and the delivery was on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Jon T. Currier

customer_reviews.title: Looks good...
customer_reviews.text: Lamps look great on my guest bed room. Easy to install and very user friendly. Only gripe is that the tension on the cord covers are not very tight, but I found a way around it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Crespo

customer_reviews.title: These were excellent! the cord cover was a nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent! the cord cover was a nice surprise. Very elegant looking in the bedroom! Kinda look cheap on here, so I was pleasantly surprised. Hotel quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We like the product because our head board has black iron design in it and the two lamps compliment the look. Cream colored shades might be a better choice as they would afford more light but for now we will live with the brown ones.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great wall Lamps
customer_reviews.text: We got the lamps in two days and installed them. The shades look great and the lamps are great for reading in bed as they can be moved to direct the light as needed.
customer_reviews.author: GFunk

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: Makes for nice bedside lamps. Where came apart from heat of the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of lamps for the bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: It's becoming increasingly difficult to find lamps that use 3-way light bulbs. These lamps have style and are great above the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shaksmom

customer_reviews.title: Great fast service... Very happy with the product... Not difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fast service... Very happy with the product... Not difficult to install, took me about 45 minutes... Would recommend to anybody who is thinking about purchasing one...
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Benthagen

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, competitive pricing and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service! They emailed detailed instructions for installation even before our order arrived. I reached out to them later for purchasing additional cord covers, they immediately responded and the covers arrived within a few days. 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fiber Addict

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love them perfect space saver and look great only needed to add a washer to get them to sit on the wall without moving when adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return them
customer_reviews.text: They seemed nice enough, but the shades are so large that I couldn't fold the lamps all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my lamps just missing detail look parts🥴
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of our new bedroom lamps ... I am missing some parts 🥴 the cord covers I only got for 1 lamp we have 2 lamps ... how can I get the parts K and J ‘s ?
customer_reviews.author: Rdscali

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for your continual support!
customer_reviews.text: My ordered arrived quickly. I had already received 2 emails coaching me on assembly. Armed with all the easy to understand instructions I had both lamps installed and functioning within half an hour. They look great and are functioning just as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the price. Love that it can have three light levels-if you buy the right bulbs. Lol
customer_reviews.author: VD

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp fixture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, worked great with 3-way LED lights, and they look quite nice on my wall. I like the extra versatility of being able to mount them with in wall wires or on wall wires.
customer_reviews.author: Danno in PDX

customer_reviews.title: No help from seller!
customer_reviews.text: One lamp doesn'tt work! No replacement offered. No help what so ever horrible!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for reading lamps to mount over our bed. Found this Kira product on Amazon and it looked like it would fill the bill--they did! Easy to mount, look good--exactly what we wanted/needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hester

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps! I have a spinal cord injury
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps! I have a spinal cord injury, and there is no ceiling light in my room. Don't want lamp tables cluttering up. The best part is that they are three-way lamps. Two together make it six way. I truly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: sirak p sarkissian

customer_reviews.title: Working ok.
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer a better product even when I would have to pay a little more. I was in a hurry to install some light in a guest room. Mounting isn't difficult but is just not proper for a code install
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Santos

customer_reviews.title: Product was exactly what I saw on the website
customer_reviews.text: I love that the lamps are wall mounted thus leaving more space on the nightstands
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these lamps
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Larger than I expected. They looked upscale and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: E Family E

customer_reviews.title: looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: looks great works well just deducted 1 star for a bent shade
customer_reviews.author: catfishjr241

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: love everything about them but the shades...they literally look and feel like cardboard :(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Look Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Look very nice, Packaged very well. No Issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bill WInans

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Quite honestly the product does not equal the quality of similar lamps purchased at Lowe's. The shades are very cheap and there is not enough channel provided to do a good job mounting the lamps. We would not buy these again. They're attractive enough but the quality is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Moj

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Installation and set up was perfect withoit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Installation and set up was perfect withoit any problems. Directions were day to follow. I strongly recommend this lamp
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: They are a mid end lamp that lends to a high end finish to any room!
customer_reviews.text: Great space savers ! Perfect to eliminate use of table tops in small living or bedding areas !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: both lamps are up and doing very good. We made a good choice. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Helen McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for wall lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Perfect over my couch. Look great and function perfectly. Packaged nicely and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better lamp than I bought (similar style but different brand) in a local hardware/home DC supply store. That one broke almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: shelly haeck

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Are exactly as advertised and look good. The material is well finished and they dont look flimsy or tacky. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nitya Malik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect kit for a do it yourselfer. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! I changed on the lamp shade for a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item and it was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Libe Valdez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights. Use them over bed for extra light in a small bedroom. Well made, easy to install. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mom446

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great basic little sconces! Easy to put up, look great and work well!
customer_reviews.author: B Yellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the matching pair set, they really look nice! Took a little time to mount, but they look so much better than table lamps. Nice lamps, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and look great. and what a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Gagliardotto Garry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and was easy to install. You had the option to install as a plug in or hard wire it. I had used a pair of lamps like it before that would not stay tight on the wall. This brand fits snug to wall. I am well pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette Pierce

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, I would use better drywall anchors unless you ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sturdy, I would use better drywall anchors unless you get into a stud, but we love them.
customer_reviews.author: William Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: We love them. They look like the ones we have ...
customer_reviews.text: We love them. They look like the ones we have now that we need to replace. The only problem is that they have an on and off switch instead of a rheostat. But we are taking them to a lighting company that can easily replace the switch with a rheo. If I had read the description better, I probably would have figured that out before buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. Doerr

customer_reviews.title: These make a nice replacement
customer_reviews.text: Lost similar lights in a house fire. These make a nice replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Hard to install when its missing parts. No wall brackets in box. Tried to call or find number or message to send to. No where to be found
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bedside reading lamps. Solid manufacture. Easy to install. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Levine

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is solid and look nice. The shade a bit darker than I anticipated ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is solid and look nice. The shade a bit darker than I anticipated but can always pick up another shade. Price excellent. Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: dutchette

customer_reviews.title: missing harps for lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, but am missing the two harps for the lampshades. Can you send my those items? Tammy Mount
customer_reviews.author: drm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Arrived well packaged in perfect condition. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dome

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price for a good product
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are very well suited to reading in bed or doing book work I am very pleased Just wish I had ordered the light colored shade The darker ones keeps the light from the rest of the room
customer_reviews.author: Business owner Martha W.

customer_reviews.title: Product looks like pictures. Came packaged very well with no damage
customer_reviews.text: Product looks like pictures. Came packaged very well with no damage. Construction of lamps exceeded my expectations, sturdy and robust.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Kira Home Cambridge 13" Swing Arm Wall Lamp - Plug in/Wall Mount, Opaque Paper Shade, 150W 3-Way + Cord Covers, Black Finish, 2-Pack
feature_bullets: TRANSITIONAL STYLE: Opaque beige paper shade directs light up or down, NOT through shade. Wall lamp features an adjustable swing arm and black finish. Can be hardwired or plugged in. Includes (4) 12" cord covers to conceal cords and clear plug-in wire

DIMENSIONS: 13" (H) x 25" (Ext) x 14.75" Projection from wall, Shade: 7.5" (H) x 13" (D) x 8" (Slant), Back plate: 6" (H) x 4.25" (W) x 0.75" (L). Smart plug compatible. 3-way bulb compatible to adjust brightness
UL LISTED FOR YOUR SAFETY: UL listed for dry locations. Uses (1) LED, CFL, or up to 150W traditional incandescent medium base bulb. Bulb sold separately

LIGHT UP ANY SPACE: Ideal for lighting specific area of the room. Mount or plug in this elegant fixture in several different rooms in your home. Ideal for the living room, bedroom, foyer, hallway, office or study
UNMATCHED QUALITY AND CUSTOMER CARE: We are confident in our attractive, innovative lighting, so all of our products come with a 1-year product warranty. Shop with confidence!
